        "body": "<center>\n![MINIUNDERSTANDINGFREQUENCY.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23u5y2fYthiCdWAV8WNKo4KDvfk2mfygDmXgZuUaFywWVzX1FtMsjPXc1ZUHHaT3T2jda.png)\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n#\n\n<center><img src=\"https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23tv8niTgDV9Nw5p2hSfnLTmaDqahUiDosHNzKbH4s77bUKPEFiUG1UZtmL4FmapuSSh8.jpg\"></center>\n<center><sub>*This is a bilingual publication, you can go directly to the SPANISH version by clicking [HERE](#Español\")*\n</sub><hr>This is my post for #freewriters 2796 prompt \"what’s the frequency?\" hosted by @mariannewest </center>\n<hr>\n\n\n\n\nTo start thinking about what is the frequency makes you analyze many things because first we have to study what is being talked about, the frequency of what?. \n\nWe can address the issue in a very general way saying and analyzing what is really the word frequency. \n\nIt is a term that can mean different things. For example, if we use it in the area of mathematics or physics, frequency will be referring to the number of times an event occurs in a specific period of time. \n\nFor example, how many times is the number of oscillations of sound, of radio or light that there are per second, measured in hertz. \n\nThen that would be the frequency of something if we speak from the point of view of physics.  \n\nIf we say that a frequency of a thousand hertz or we speak of a frequency of a thousand hertz or that that device has a frequency of a thousand hertz, we are saying that that wave is repeated a thousand times in a second. \n\nWhich would be a device probably military or we would be talking about a gadget of a military technology that has that ability to repeat a thousand waves, a thousand times that wave in a second. It would probably be a device like microwaves. \n\nI don't know if the microwave ovens work that way, but it makes me think about it. \n\nThis is in physics and mathematics.  \n\nIf we move on to another topic, if we talk about how it can be seen for example in statistics, this word frequency then we are talking about the number of times that a value appears in a set of data. \n\nIt can be for example absolute when we talk about the number of repetitions or relative that provides is a proportion with respect to the total. \n\nTo put an example, I am going to give you an example of this of an absolute frequency. When I worked in the world of surveys, in a survey if 50 people prefer the color green, then the absolute frequency is 50, ok? So we can see it then. \n\nThis reflects what the statistical part of this is.  \n\nIf we speak in everyday language, because it is the regularity with which something happens. \n\nFor example, we are going to put an example: \"I have insomnia with frequency.\" This means that very often I suffer from insomnia of not being able to sleep. \n\nThis would be applied to the word frequency to everyday language.  \n\nAnd if we apply it to the world of telecommunications, that is something similar to what I was talking about, similar to what I was talking about microwaves, is the band in which the signals are emitted. \n\nNot as for example the wifi, the cell phones, the short band radios, the communication of 11 meters or of different meters, no, because there wide band also that are other frequencies, no. \n\nThen we can say that, for example, the 11 meter band, true, it works at frequency 102.5 modulated frequency. \n\nThen we are talking about another aspect of the frequency.  \n\nAs we see, this is a word that is very rich and determine what is the frequency depending on the context in which it is used leads us to a universe completely different. \n\nIn general, the frequency indicates a repetition in time, in data or constant, and depending on the context in which it is used because it can enrich a lot a story or a text or just take us to talk about a general knowledge. \n\nAs if I do it this time to talk to you about what is the frequency from the aspect of make a contribution for those who read me to see the different points of how they can use this word and so they can enrich more content.  \n\n\n<center>Translated with [Deepsek AI](https://deepseek.com) \n</p></center>\n\n# <center><div class=\"phishy\">Español<a id=\"Español\"></a></div></center>\n\n\nPonerse a pensar de cuál es la frecuencia hace analizar muchas cosas, porque primeramente tenemos que estudiar de qué se está hablando, ¿la frecuencia de qué?. \n\nPodemos abordar el tema de una manera muy general diciendo y analizando lo que es realmente la palabra frecuencia. \n\nEs un término que puede significar distintas cosas. Por ejemplo, si lo utilizamos en el área de las matemáticas o de la física, frecuencia va a estar refiriéndose al número de veces que ocurre un evento en un periodo de tiempo específico. \n\nPor ejemplo, cuántas veces es el número de oscilaciones de sonido, de radio o de luz que hay por segundo, medido en hertz. \n\nEntonces esa sería la frecuencia de algo si hablamos desde el punto de vista de física.  \n\nSi decimos que una frecuencia de mil hercios o hablamos de una frecuencia de mil hercios, o que ese aparato tiene una frecuencia de mil hercios, estamos diciendo que esa onda se repite mil veces en un segundo. \n\nLo cual sería pues un aparato probablemente militar o estaríamos hablando de un gadget o de una tecnología militar que tiene esa capacidad de repetir mil ondas mil veces esa onda en un segundo. Probablemente sería un aparato como microondas. No sé si los hornos microondas trabajan de esa manera, pero me hace pensar en ello. \n\nEsto es en física y en matemática.  \n\nSi pasamos a otro tema, si hablamos de cómo se puede ver, por ejemplo, en estadística esta palabra frecuencia, entonces estamos hablando de la cantidad de veces que un valor aparece en un conjunto de datos. \n\nPuede ser, por ejemplo, absoluta cuando hablamos del número de repeticiones, o relativa, que proporciona una proporción respecto al total. \n\nPara poner un ejemplo, les voy a poner un ejemplo de esto de una frecuencia absoluta. Cuando yo trabajaba en el mundo de las encuestas, en una encuesta si 50 personas prefieren el color verde, entonces la frecuencia absoluta es de 50. Ok, así lo podemos ver. \n\nEntonces esto refleja lo que es la parte estadística de esto.  \n\nSi hablamos en el lenguaje cotidiano, pues es la regularidad con la que algo sucede. \n\nPor ejemplo, vamos a poner un ejemplo: yo tengo insomnio con frecuencia. Esto significa que pues muy a menudo yo sufro de insomnio, de no poder dormir.\n\n Esto sería aplicado a la palabra frecuencia al lenguaje cotidiano.  \n\nY si lo aplicamos al mundo de telecomunicaciones, que es algo parecido a lo que hablaba, similar a lo que hablaba de microondas, es la banda en la que se emiten las señales. \n\nComo por ejemplo el wifi, los celulares, los radios de banda corta, la comunicación de 11 metros o de distintos metros, porque hay de banda ancha también que son otras frecuencias. \n\nEntonces podemos decir que, por ejemplo, la banda oncemetrista funciona en la frecuencia 102.5 frecuencia modulada. \n\nEntonces estamos hablando de otro aspecto de la frecuencia.  \n\nComo vemos, esta es una palabra que es muy rica, y determinar cuál es la frecuencia dependiendo del contexto en el que se utilice nos lleva a un universo completamente diferente. \n\nEn general, la frecuencia indica una repetición en el tiempo, en los datos o constancia, y dependiendo del contexto en el que se utilice pues puede enriquecer mucho una historia o un texto, o simplemente llevarnos a hablar de un conocimiento general.\n\nComo decidí yo hacerlo en esta ocasión de hablarles de cuál es la frecuencia. \n\nDesde el aspecto de hacer un aporte para quienes me lean, de que vean los distintos puntos de cómo pueden usar esta palabra y así pues puedan enriquecer más sus contenidos.\n\n\n\n\n</div>\n\n<center>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nThumbnail of the post edit using [canva.com ](https://www.canva.com/)and maded with [Bing         "body": "<center>\n\n\n\n![MINIWHENACHILDDREAMCAMESONTOTERROR.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23vhTrTBCZ3qcx1UfS8G7ptGM1LLkmRR3eU7QhNPdfTtTDzWGPwGNub8KjpVAzFC1yDTq.png)\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n#\n\n<center><img src=\"https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23tv8niTgDV9Nw5p2hSfnLTmaDqahUiDosHNzKbH4s77bUKPEFiUG1UZtmL4FmapuSSh8.jpg\"></center>\n<center><sub>*This is a bilingual publication, you can go directly to the SPANISH version by clicking [HERE](#Español\")*\n</sub><hr>This is my post for #freewriters 2795 prompt frown on a clown hosted by @mariannewest </center>\n<hr>\n\n\n\nThe child happily asked his father to take him to the circus. It was a very special occasion because this circus only came to the city once every five years. \n\nIt was a circus that was known to be called the traveling circus.  \n\nThere was a group of artists from different places who were recruited by Mr. La Roca. It was the name that the host of the circus had. He was the one who appeared in all the posters with his long silver-colored cane and a huge mane-shaped mustache with a cape hat and a monocle in his left eye.  \n\nHe presented the circus as the most important novelty of all time. With its main attraction, the clown Viruta. \n\nHe was a clown who was characterized by having large proportions.  \n\nHe was very fat and appeared as a very funny and comical character. \n\nLittle Jorge, the child, always caught his attention and had a lot of fun when he saw the commercials of this clown on television. Since he was six years old, he looked at them and at eleven years old he really wanted his father to take him to the circus to witness the act of Viruta.  \n\nWith so much insistence, the father finally agreed to take little Jorge to the circus. The long-awaited day arrived. Little Jorge could not sleep the night before.  \n\nHe turned and turned in his bed, hoping, just thinking about all the excitement of being able to witness live and direct the clown they had been waiting for so long. \n\nThe day came, it was early in the morning, little Jorge took his breakfast and with great enthusiasm, he greeted and gave his good morning to his parents. \n\nHis parents, very grateful, saw how little Jorge, from early in the morning, had dressed up, he had already dressed with his new and shiny shoes, with his best suit and the hood that always characterized him.  \n\n<center><img src=\"https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23tv8niTgDV9Nw5p2hSfnLTmaDqahUiDosHNzKbH4s77bUKPEFiUG1UZtmL4FmapuSSh8.jpg\"></center>\n\nIn this case it was a hood that had the logo of Mario Bros, his favorite game. \n\nLittle Jorge, from early in the morning, was ready to go to the circus. The final moment came when they already boarded the vehicle to go to the circus and every second that passed, little Jorge was full of anxiety to get to the place, until they finally arrived, they queued up to buy the tickets and little Jorge listened to the music of the circus, the elephants and the roars of the tigers.  \n\nThe excitement was at its highest level, in addition to the fuss and all the atmosphere of children with balloons, cotton candy and the circus atmosphere, the truth, made the levels of dopamine rise, not only in the children but also in the parents. \n\nThey entered, the presenter came out, announcing and welcoming the act with his long mustache and presenting the first acts, until finally in the middle appeared the famous Viruta, doing a spectacular act, jumping from a very tall tower into a very small pool of water. \n\nThe result was that he really came out all wet and with his face all wet and his makeup was run, and at that moment little Jorge frown on a clown because he saw the clown's face and saw that that face was the same face that terrified him since many nights in his dreams, a person who appeared by the edge of his window with a knife and very sharp teeth, who told him that he was coming for him, to look for him and take him away.  \n\nMario Bros's soundtrack was heard in the background, in the environment.\n\nAt that precise moment, little Jorge burst into tears in the middle of the show and the parents were amazed not to know what was happening. \n\nThe nightmare had come true.\n<center>Translated with [Deepsek AI](https://deepseek.com) \n</p></center>\n\n# <center><div class=\"phishy\">Español<a id=\"Español\"></a></div></center>\n\n\nEl niño le pidió felizmente a su padre que lo llevara al circo. Era una ocasión muy especial porque este circo solo llegaba a la ciudad una vez cada cinco años. \n\nEra un circo que era conocido como el circo viajero.  \n\nHabía un grupo de artistas de diferentes lugares que fueron reclutados por el Sr. La Roca. Era el nombre que tenía el anfitrión del circo. Él era el que aparecía en todos los carteles con su larga vara de color plateado, un enorme bigote en forma de melena, un sombrero de capa y un monóculo en su ojo izquierdo.  \n\nPresentaba el circo como la novedad más importante de todos los tiempos, con su principal atracción: el payaso Viruta. \n\nEra un payaso que se caracterizaba por tener proporciones enormes.  \n\nEra muy gordo y aparecía como un personaje muy divertido y cómico. \n\nEl pequeño Jorge, el niño, siempre captaba su atención y se divertía mucho cuando veía los comerciales de este payaso en la televisión. Desde los seis años los veía, y a los once años realmente deseaba que su padre lo llevara al circo para presenciar el acto de Viruta.  \n\nCon tanta insistencia, el padre finalmente accedió a llevar al pequeño Jorge al circo. Llegó el tan esperado día. El pequeño Jorge no pudo dormir la noche anterior.  \n\nSe movía de un lado a otro en su cama, esperando, solo pensando en toda la emoción de poder presenciar en vivo y directo al payaso que habían estado esperando por tanto tiempo. \n\nLlegó el día, era temprano en la mañana, el pequeño Jorge tomó su desayuno y con gran entusiasmo saludó y dio los buenos días a sus padres. \n\nSus padres, muy agradecidos, vieron cómo el pequeño Jorge, desde temprano, se había vestido con sus zapatos nuevos y relucientes, su mejor traje y la capucha que siempre lo caracterizaba.  \n\n<center><img src=\"https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23tv8niTgDV9Nw5p2hSfnLTmaDqahUiDosHNzKbH4s77bUKPEFiUG1UZtmL4FmapuSSh8.jpg\"></center>\n\nEn este caso, era una capucha que tenía el logo de Mario Bros, su juego favorito.\n\nEl pequeño Jorge, desde temprano, estaba listo para ir al circo. Llegó el momento final cuando ya abordaron el vehículo para ir al circo, y cada segundo que pasaba, el pequeño Jorge estaba lleno de ansias por llegar al lugar. Finalmente llegaron, hicieron fila para comprar los boletos y el pequeño Jorge escuchó la música del circo, los elefantes y los rugidos de los tigres.  \n\nLa emoción estaba en su nivel más alto, además del bullicio y todo el ambiente de niños con globos, algodón de azúcar y el ambiente circense, la verdad, hacía que los niveles de dopamina subieran, no solo en los niños sino también en los padres. \n\nEntraron, salió el presentador, anunciando y dando la bienvenida al acto con su largo bigote y presentando los primeros números, hasta que finalmente, en el medio, apareció el famoso Viruta, haciendo un acto espectacular: saltando desde una torre muy alta a una pequeña piscina de agua.\n\nEl resultado fue que salió completamente mojado, con la cara empapada y el maquillaje corrido, y en ese momento el pequeño Jorge frunció el ceño porque vio la cara del payaso y reconoció que esa cara era la misma que lo aterrorizaba desde hacía muchas noches en sus sueños: una persona que aparecía al borde de su ventana con un cuchillo y dientes muy afilados, que le decía que venía por él, a buscarlo y llevárselo.  \n\nLa banda sonora de Mario Bros se escuchaba de fondo, en el ambiente.\n\nEn ese preciso momento, el pequeño Jorge estalló en llanto en medio del espectáculo y los padres quedaron asombrados sin saber qué estaba pasando. \n\nLa pesadilla se había hecho realidad.\n\n\n\n\n</div>\n\n<center>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nThumbnail of the post edit using [canva.com ](https://www.canva.com/)and maded with [Leonardo ai](https://app.leonardo.ai/)\n\n\n![sepmanclarciudad.jpg](https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23u5SwkDMqTct4Kgqsv3RVeNxduJ3R3FDChujBLRHKcxWWPmnvnMa18nuuKjHxhFkJSK3.gif)\n<sub>This is my black cat \"manclar\", this hive name account is to honor his dead (it happened years ago).</sub>\n\n![](https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://cdn.rcimg.net/MicroReylatos/eea03629/39af3c9a0e98248e06b4b9e61ceb136d.png)\n\n\nThe divisor is made by @albiro2050, if you want one made in your style, visit him and he will gladly take care of your commission.\n</center>\n\n---\n\n",

        "body": "<center>\n![MINIGOODORBAD.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23wqnVuRn1UqrcRGV5owJ72chp9WBqtihwzsG6qdfBpA3fwfW9NtFVRXG1bjdQyH5NfuG.png)\n\n\n\n \n  \n \n\n\n\n\n\n<sub>This is a publication based on the suggested topic proposed in the Hive Learners community through their discord, which on this occasion is <b>\"HUMAN TRAITS\"</b>.\n</center>\n\n\n  \n\n---\n\n<center><h4>\"We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.\"\n<<    Aristotle >>\n</h4></center>\n\n  \n \n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n  \n<sub></b></sub></div>\n  \n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n\n<hr>\n  \n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n</center>\n\n\nWelcome to my blog. This time I'm going to talk about the human traits. \n\nThis is a topic quite interesting because people, I think, they learn to be good or bad, and this is due to many factors that condition their way of being. \n\nThe environment can make a person become someone quite resentful for the amount of experiences he has had in life.  \n\nIf we take for example the case of people who live in a toxic environment full of crime, full of poverty, surrounded by many needs, it is very likely that the person has a great tendency to see how the people of the bad living live, and it is very likely that they take that path.\n\n I know there are currently people who do not follow that example and who are from humble places and take the right path, but I particularly believe that this is learned by the same society, by the same medium.  \n\nIt's like people had that instinct to see the malice, to see how other people who are doing harm progress in life, and obviously see how they progress easily. \n\nAnd obviously, these people grab or take that bad example of those people who take that path, and it is not correct, but it is a life decision of everyone. Many will say that it is the free will. I rather see it as those people take the easy way.  \n\nThere are also people who have been born with that tendency, like \"I'm going to be the bad one,\" of being very naughty. \n\nI believe that everything is part of a great educational process and teaching that son or that new life or that person who is under your tutelage, because it may be possible that you are not a father and you have in your position a minor or a person to whom you have to educate, and you have to prepare that person for life, to make her a good man or a good woman, a productive citizen for the world.  \n\nAnd this is only learned through life lessons and having good ethics, giving the example above all of how to live correctly, being a good person. \n\nAnd this includes several things because this goes from respect to people who live around you, collaborate with people who need it. \n\nI think to be humanitarian, to be a generous person, a person who contributes and participates actively helping the society or the community in which it is involved.  \n\nThen I think if they are educated from an early age, the children are going to be good people. \n\nAt least that's what I have seen in several cases. \n\nI can cite recently the case of a friend of mine from many years ago who had a child who has neurodivergence problems. Before it was known as autism; now it is given another connotation and another name. \n\nThe fact is that this boy is already a teenager, and it has always been complicated to deal with him because he offends people, he does rudeness to people, and he is already a good teenager, I think who is 16 or 17 years old.  \n\nAnd recently I found out that they arrested him because he stole a person's wallet. \n\nAnd of course, he shields himself or justifies what he is doing because he says that he tells the authorities or tells everyone that he is neurodivergent, that he is a special person. \n\nAnd yet here the laws were applied because he said that he stole the wallet to that person by just doing a game, that doesnt was on serious. \n\nThen, is he a bad person? I honestly think he is a bad person because it is not about him being neurodivergent. On the contrary, the people who have this characteristic are usually smarter than the average of people.  \n\nAnd in the case of him, because it turned out that he really is a person who proceeded with malice, and so the laws of here and the investigation they did detected it and qualified it that way. \n\nBut he was not born like that; he became tremendous because the mother did not give him the necessary education, did not put the necessary correctives. \n\nAnd I'm not talking about being strong with him, but try to educate him from love and since he understands what life is like, that respect is explained to older people and people with the one he lives, and knowing that life is not a game.  \n\nThen I think, from my space, from my point of view, things are like that. \n\nI think you are not born being good or being bad, but you learn to be good or to be bad. And this is a question that has to do a lot with education and the environment in which the person develops. \n\nIt has a lot of tendency, as I said at the beginning: if the person gets involved in a medium that is positive, because this influence is going to have, this medium is going to have a very positive influence on him, and it is very likely that he comes out as a good citizen and a good person. \n\nIf it is the other way around, because it is very likely that it will be the opposite.\n\n\n\n<hr>\n \n</div>\n\n\n \n\n\n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n<sub>This is my black cat \"manclar\", this  account is to honor his dead (it happened years ago).</sub> \n</center>\n \n<center>\n![firmanclaravatar50.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23xoaKGtUX7bFkH9miKiyCofJxFmB9eVPahe6bypqtgorcdrUH6LmvJQA51mg9G54D5ed.png)\n<hr>\nVisit the Neon Strike discord, the game of the future today!\n<a href=\"https://discord.gg/k8Db657uMW\">\n<img src=\"https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/midnight-studio/23wWprbiQYjoYfCn2ZT4225KZD19hhwxDaEt1FHyGNLwzriiaf8r9Mf5knk96FMGq5jBC.png\"><sub>(Discord)</sub></a>\n\n<center>\nCredits:\n\nThumbnail image maded using <a href=\"https://sl.bing.net/cplOOauknlY\n\">Bing AI</a> and edited with <a href=\"https://www.canva.com/design/DAFzU3jLsdI/mDAzQI5br7TWyqx_ww5WqA/edit?utm_content=DAFzU3jLsdI&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton\">Canva.com</a>\nAll images in the post are created by AI, those children do not exist in the real world.\nThe text dividers were made by me using [aseprite](https://www.aseprite.org/)\nPost translated from spanish to english using <a href=\"https://deepseek.com/\">Deepseek AI</a>\n</center>\n \n\n[//]: # (CCC LINKS PLACEHOLDER, DON'T DELETE THIS TAG)",

        "body": "<center>\n![MINISHOULDZOOSEXISTS.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23vhwxbGnb94WnTLBuzCek3XDqpb4kp6xU1NBTWvM3nbqMwFoEVac8ZGkWVN3pQffywoN.png)\n\n\n\n \n \n \n\n\n\n\n\n<sub>This is a publication based on the suggested topic proposed in the Hive Learners community through their discord, which on this occasion is <b>\"ALL ABOUT THE ZOO\"</b>.\n</center>\n\n\n  \n\n---\n\n<center><h4>\"The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated.\"\n<<   Mahatma Gandhi >>\n</h4></center>\n\n  \n \n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n  \n<sub></b></sub></div>\n  \n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n\n<hr>\n  \n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n</center>\n\n\nWelcome new and regular users to my blog. \n\nToday's topic is all about zoologicals and it is that looking at it from my point of view, zoologicals are used for entertainment of human beings and at first, to be honest, I find that it is quite despicable to use them as entertainment for the human being because the animals from my point of view must be free, they should not be pets, especially wild animals, but in this publication I am going to carry out an analysis studying the pros and cons that I see in this, firstly because I see I have many ethical concerns in terms of this and animal exploitation, as I have said, exploiting animals for entertainment there is something that is very bad.  \n\nThere are zoos that attract visitors prioritizing entertainment before the well-being of the animal and this means that the animal does not behave as it is in nature.  \n\nIn a case of these are the forced shows in the marine parks where they make the dolphins jump for food and things like that, then this causes the animals to become a show, this creates psychological damage that because the animals while they are captive while they are closed locked up show a condition called zoocosis that are stereotypical behaviors such as self-mutilation such as vomiting such as pacing that occur due to stress and boredom then and in some cases they are injected or they are put antidepressants to handle these problems then it is altering the biology of the animal and there is also the case of euthanasia in zoos not because the breeding of animals in zoos creates excesses of animals and these animals can be sacrificed as happened for example with the giraffes marius in copenhagen or they can be sold to deficient facilities or used in private hunts that use them for entertainment there are people who do this there is an analysis of this thinking about the well-being of these animals when they are locked up versus the freedom that they are in nature.  \n\nThen I am going to detail it in this way the life expectancy true because the animals that are the wild animals their life expectancy is shorter, because this is because they are predators that get sick that they are hungry while for the animals that are in captivity the life expectancy is longer for some species because for example for veterinary care etc. \n\nBut it is also shorter for others not for example the elephants live half their lives while they are in captivity with respect to how the wild animals behave while they are in freedom because they hunt, they have their migrations and their natural social structures that is, they behave as they should be while an animal that is in a closed zoo, because it will not be able to move freely, it has restricted movement, and the social groups are artificial, and they depend exclusively on the human being then the behavior of the animal in the zoo is changing. \n\nAnd this is not good at all because an animal is being shown or an animal that does not have a natural behavior, that is, we are showing a creature that people can misinterpret or generally misinterpret that it behaves that way and in reality they are seeing an animal that behaves that way because it is locked up but that is not its natural behavior.  \n\nAnd well another aspect also that is a key difference in the quality of life of animals is their physical health, wild animals are true when they are not in captivity they have more genetic diversity because they adapt to the different challenges, while the animals that are in captivity are true they are usually more obese they are very prone to infections and disorders by endogamy then captivity can reduce the immediate threat.  \n\nFor example all those hunters in Africa that kill animals and sell them on the market but it denies the autonomy of animals and natural experiences because there is the example of cetaceans that while they are put in tanks they swim in a circle in reality of traveling all the thousands of kilometers or hundreds of kilometers a day that they travel in their natural environment and this is locked up traveling in a circle psychologically damages the fish and causes muscle atrophy then we are doing damage to those animals.  \n\nIn addition to the fact that there is a problem with this of zoos also because the funds are poorly distributed, the zoos allocate less than 4.2 percent of their income to conversation in situ the protection of habitat and use most of these income in exhibitions and marketing. \n\nThen this is an obvious problem in addition to the fact that very few of the programs that are in zoos release animals back to nature by citing an example 3 only 3 of 400 pandas raised in captivity survive when released not precisely because the animals as they are in captivity do not learn to have the behavior and skills they have when they live in their natural space.  \n\nIn addition to the fact that people who go to zoos have as a priority to educate themselves because most of the people go only to entertain themselves to recreate watching the tiger or the bear or the locked-up elephant in reality I think that this can be solved true with technology and having documentaries and also using virtual reality to see the animals how they behave in their environment ok and having sanctuaries where there is no intervention of human beings because we can solve this problem.  \n\nI personally believe that zoos are only necessary when they are facilities that prioritize the rescue of animals, when they are injured or animals that are decommissioned, because they were going to be sold.\n\n I  believe that all governments must allocate funds to protect the habitats of animals and that they fight against theft and prioritize sanctuaries, instead of zoological. So that they can take the animals to those protected areas where there is no human intervention of any kind, and where the animals can be freely. \n \nI think that this is the solution and essentially beacuse the animals  belong to nature not to a zoo.\nBecause as long as they are locked up the animals are being served that is, they are exhibiting them as entertainment and that should not be, because they should not be made for the common, they should not be at the disposal of human curiosity. \n\nThey must put the interests of the animals first and not the interests of human beings. \n\nThis is my analysis of about this topic of this week,  I hope you have enjoyed it.  \n\n\n\n\n\n<hr>\n \n</div>\n\n\n         "beneficiaries": [],
        "body": "<center>\n![MINICUANDOLOQUEAHCESNOFUNCIONA.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23wgPfXRy9De5uggrob1mNiWWEBPbfbNRqjBmSf2TAARsrZdJ5yWeieWJAT8SXKc1p51V.png)\n</center>\n\n---\n \n \n\n<sub>Esta es una publicación basada en el tema de la semana propuesto por @talentos, conducido por @angelica7 y que en esta ocasión es  <a href=\"https://peakd.com/c/hive-147177/created\">\"Mantenimiento\"</a> .</sub></div>\n<hr>\n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n<center><h4>\"El progreso es imposible sin cambiar.\" \n<< George Bernard Shaw >></h4></center>\n<hr>\n<div class=\"text-justify\"> \n\n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n</center>\n\n\nBienvenidos a mi blog. \n\nEl tema para esta semana es el mantenimiento, y es que hablar de esto es algo bastante importante, pues ¿cómo podemos avanzar en la vida si no tenemos una política, una forma de pensar, unos principios que vamos renovando y que vamos revisando cada cierto tiempo?. Es muy importante tener en cuenta estos factores, sobre todo cuando ves que intentas salir adelante y, por más que lo intentas, no logras hacerlo. \n\nY es que muchas personas cometen el error de mantenerse todo el tiempo haciendo la misma cosa; es decir, si alguien ve que no avanza, pues obviamente algo está fallando y es necesario cambiar el método o la forma en que se está haciendo esa cosa.  \n\nY es que dentro de mis fundamentos en la vida está el tener ciertos proyectos y ciertos propósitos por los que estoy avanzando. Entre las cosas que puedo comentarles, por ejemplo, está el propósito que me puse de aprender pixel art y avanzar hasta un nivel en el que yo pueda tener una galería de NFTs y lograr ese propósito. \n\nYo me propuse esa meta y, asombrosamente, pensaba que no iba a lograr esa meta rápidamente, y prácticamente en menos de dos años logré llegar a un nivel bastante sorprendente, en el que tengo muchísima habilidad para hacer mis artes en una hora o en menor cantidad de tiempo. \n\nEsto se debe precisamente a que yo me mantuve todo el tiempo puliendo las cosas que estaban fallando, aquellos detalles en los que no era habilidoso, aquellas cosas en las que veía que se me dificultaba el poder realizar los dibujos digitales, y lo fui perfeccionando. O sea, tuve un mantenimiento con eso.  \n\nEn relación a mi vida y las metas actuales que tengo, pues debo decir que acá estoy bastante decepcionado de Hive, porque las metas que me he propuesto no las he alcanzado, y he estado haciendo los últimos tres años las cosas de una manera, digamos, siguiendo las recomendaciones que me dan los supuestos grandes de Hive, las supuestas grandes comunidades de Hive, solamente para probar lo que les voy a decir a continuación: que lo que ellos dicen no me ha funcionado, para mí no es correcto. \n\nHe hecho y he seguido cada una de las pautas que, supuestamente —y digo supuestamente porque precisamente no me han funcionado en mi caso— para tener un blog exitoso, y no ha resultado de esta manera.  \n\nEntonces, pues dentro de mi mantenimiento, he decidido cambiar la política y la manera en que hago los blogs, dándole un rumbo quizás más ligero y prestándole menos atención a detalles que estas grandes comunidades y estos grandes curadores mencionan como importantes y que a mí no me han resultado. \n\nFíjense que curiosamente, cuando hago las cosas a mi manera, sin seguir lo que otras personas han marcado como exitoso o como un mantenimiento correcto de los blogs para poder tener éxito, simplemente lo he aplicado a mi forma y a mi manera de ver las cosas, y estoy teniendo mucho éxito actualmente, al punto en que me siento mucho más relajado y siento que estoy avanzando hacia otro sentido, despejándome o liberándome un poco de lo que ha resultado para mí.  \n\nEl estar en el ambiente latino no he querido desligar bastante de eso, y estoy ya en otros mundos con respecto a Hive, y esto me hace sentir muy bien porque es una representación y un síntoma de que las ideas que tengo han evolucionado y están funcionando de la manera correcta.  \n\nTambién el mantenimiento en otras cosas que he puesto en marcha en mi vida recientemente, con otra iniciativa que no tiene nada que ver con Hive, me ha resultado exitosa y me está dando muy buenos frutos. \n\nEstoy bastante contento con lo que estoy haciendo en estos momentos, y pues simplemente puedo decir que me va bien, que me va bien porque es algo extra, aparte de Hive, y son dos cosas extras que estoy manejando aparte de Hive para llevar el mantenimiento de mi vida e ir separándome paulatinamente de cómo venía haciendo las cosas acá en la colmena, porque no me están produciendo las recompensas que yo esperaba.  \n\nHe invertido muchísimo esfuerzo y muchísimo de mi tiempo —ocho años— para ni siquiera poder tener en estos momentos, digamos, un gran stake construido, debido a ciertos problemas personales y ciertas cosas que no vienen al caso y que no voy a explicarles en estos momentos.\n\nPero lo que sí quiero decir es que con este tema del mantenimiento es muy importante revisar el rumbo de la vida que tiene cada quien. \n\nYo he revisado el rumbo de mi vida y he cambiado este rumbo a otro sentido que me está dando muy buenos resultados en esta etapa y en este momento, y estoy muy contento y muy feliz por ello.\n\n\n\n\n \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n</div>\n\n<center>\n\n\n\n\n<hr>\n\n</div>\n\n\n\n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVEgrande.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23uQrctdq5iWhp19Z8VE3hGiRitrzncjxKkMzwRRbBc9oJ6ho3VbKb3WFa3HxcNXKrRj5.png)\n</center>\n\n<center>\n\n<sub>This is my black cat \"manclar\", this  account is to honor his dead (it happened years ago).</sub> \n</center>\n\n\n![firmanclaravatar50.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23xoaKGtUX7bFkH9miKiyCofJxFmB9eVPahe6bypqtgorcdrUH6LmvJQA51mg9G54D5ed.png)\n</center>\nVisit the Neon Strike discord, the game of the future today!<a href=\"https://discord.gg/k8Db657uMW\">\n<img         "body": "<center>\n![MINISKILLS.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23uQkM3DHr6yn78teApFJSXfpSS29dLMD86fGF5BwLiDNVtmTMpkWWHBD5TmAzahHoFx5.png)\n\n\n\n \n\n \n\n\n\n\n\n<sub>This is a publication based on the suggested topic proposed in the Hive Learners community through their discord, which on this occasion is <b>\"PRACTICAL SKILLS\"</b>.\n</center>\n\n\n  \n\n---\n\n<center><h4>\"Do what you love, and you’ll never work a day in your life.\"\n<<   Confucius >>\n</h4></center>\n\n  \n \n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n  \n<sub></b></sub></div>\n  \n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n\n<hr>\n  \n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n</center>\n\n\nHello my new and active readers to the blog. Today the topic that I am going to talk about are the Practical Skills. \n\nWe live in a world where we are used to have social networks to make interactions, watching videos, commenting, publications giving opinions about different things and really our most part of life is focused digitally, especially the new generations and people like me that we have decided to dedicate ourselves to the online business.  \n\nThis is interesting because it comes to us to highlight the question of what skills we have that have nothing to do with the online space or online activities. In my case, I have always had a great vocation to dedicate myself to what is the technological aspect. \n\nI also have other skills that I am going to comment on after addressing this because I can defend myself in several scenarios that are extremely interesting and in fact I have lived those scenarios before working on the internet for several years in each of them, dedicating myself to what I am going to comment on.  \n\nThe first scenario that I am going to make reference to is the part that has to do with computing. It is a bit linked to the online part but since always when there was no internet, computers have existed and my interest was born around the 80s with the time of video games and my interest was always to learn to program and build a video game. \n\nThen through the years I learned programming among other skills. I know how to program, I have that skill. I would not like to have to use that skill to earn a living because programming is something that requires a lot of mental activity and is forced.  \n\nI have had to see how professional people make programs for companies and I have really reviewed the programs and especially when I was working for the military and I saw how the military made the programs and it really is something that is complicated and requires a lot of attention and work. \n\nBut I dedicated myself to learning everything that is the programming part and then another more interesting part which is the part of computer repair.  \n\nThen one of my skills, surely to the surprise of many people here in the air, is to repair computers. I can repair a computer at a physical level that has some damaged track or that does not turn on. I have that ability to repair it physically to grab a soldering iron and repair the motherboard of the computer or repair a memory. \n\nEven if I wanted I could repair a RAM memory or even the CPU of a computer, the processor of a computer, since in fact in an opportunity working for the military I had to make a repair of a chip of a processor that had damaged legs and I had to repair it and I did it because it is a process that is done using a magnifying glass and a clamp to go repairing with extreme precision.  \n\nIt is a job like making a miniature to repair this apart from all the other repairs that can be done to a computer such as the DVD disk reading units, the source of power to maintain the card and of course the part that has to do with the programming and installation of all the software of the computer. But this is just one of the skills that I learned.  \n\nAnother of the great skills that I have, I'm going to tell you about three, it's going to be a little long but it's an interesting topic. Another of the skills that I have is the ability of oratory. For a long time I was a person who worked on the radio in the location doing radio programs and for a long time I had podcasts too. I created my own podcast and I stopped.  \n\nAlso apart from creating these podcasts and these radio programs where I talked about topics in general, the part of the speech I approached the part of voice dubbing. \n\nThen for a time of my life although I have that profession that I have never exercised, I know how to do voice dubbing. I had the opportunity to do the dubbing of the voice of predator in a sketch of a famous series called Robotchicken where predator and alien appear in a car and I did the voice of predator in that opportunity, voice dubbing to the latin part.  \n\nAnother skill that I have, the ability of speech and the ability to talk to people, dubbing or voice imitation. \n\nFor this I did a professional course many years ago with a well-known person who is Mr. Renzo Jiménez, for those who do not know is the voice of Squid the character of SpongeBob and the voice of many other characters of TV series and movies. Then this is another skill that I have.  \n\nAnd the third skill which for me is the most interesting is that I am psychic and clairvoyant. \n\nThis is a skill that I have from birth and I realized that I had it many years ago and I always had that concern to develop this skill. For this I dedicated myself to attend endless conferences to read many books about this until finally for the 90s, maybe before I do not remember precisely between the late 80s and early 90s, I managed to contact with the people of the Venezuelan Center of Pyramidal Research and there I met a guru who was a disciple of Sapia Saybaba.  \n\nAnd in the Venezuelan Center of Pyramidal Research they hired me as a tarot reader and I had skills and I had learned to read the cards. \n\nI had already worked many years in this of reading the cards that I learned on my own ok for having the skill just reading and then I worked on a phone line of psychics where the cards were read to people.  \n\nI worked many years on that, I had personal and private consultation many years also offering reading of cards and tarot to many people and with this guru of the Venezuelan Center of Pyramidal Research I learned many things among them I learned to develop intuition. He gave us a workshop development of intuition and with those tools I started to educate and teach to other people.  \n\nFor many years I was about 25 years giving tarot classes, reading of hands, of pendulum, of radiesthesia, of different types of mancias ok and techniques of meditation of energy projections and all this field. \n\nIn addition to this obviously as it is something linked I got involved of the paranormal and I decided also address the issue that goes parallel also to this reading of cards address the issue which has to do with paranormal research.  \n\nThen during those years I gave many conferences UFO phenomenon, UFOs, unidentified flying objects and I participated with people who have a lot knowledge of this who are from Mexico and other parts of the world, other paranormal researchers with whom I shared a lot of time about these issues.  \n\nThen these are the skills that I possess and some of which I have. \n\nI have other skills such as like being a chef or Italian food cook because I also learned that for many years. Then these are several skills that I have and that I have and that at any time that the internet is over or that I stop of being all this because I can use it without any inconvenience.  \n\nI am prepared to be able to live in a world where there is no computer easily without any kind of problem. Also with the ability of speech that I have I borrowed another skill and with this I think there are five or six extra skills of which I am talking to you that I have which is the ability to tell stories.  \n\nFor a while I also participated when I was young in vacation plans being a guide for children and telling them stories, being stories for children and for teenagers. \n\nI also currently do horror stories for different genres from children's stories for young people and for adults too, especially for adults mystery and horror stories. I am a writer, I can dedicate myself to that easily.  \n\nThen I hope you have learned something, known a little more about my person and the skills I have. \n\nI do not know if at some point I have shared them here but now you know. \n\nThank you very much for reading me and until another opportunity.\n\n\n\n\n<hr>\n \n</div>\n\n\n \n\n\n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n<sub>This is my black cat \"manclar\", this  account is to honor his dead (it happened years ago).</sub> \n</center>\n \n<center>\n![firmanclaravatar50.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23xoaKGtUX7bFkH9miKiyCofJxFmB9eVPahe6bypqtgorcdrUH6LmvJQA51mg9G54D5ed.png)\n<hr>\nVisit the Neon Strike discord, the game of the future today!\n<a href=\"https://discord.gg/k8Db657uMW\">\n<img src=\"https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/midnight-studio/23wWprbiQYjoYfCn2ZT4225KZD19hhwxDaEt1FHyGNLwzriiaf8r9Mf5knk96FMGq5jBC.png\"><sub>(Discord)</sub></a>\n\n<center>\nCredits:\n\nThumbnail image maded using <a href=\"https://sl.bing.net/ggPudoodKFM\n\">Bing AI</a> and edited with <a href=\"https://www.canva.com/design/DAFzU3jLsdI/mDAzQI5br7TWyqx_ww5WqA/edit?utm_content=DAFzU3jLsdI&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton\">Canva.com</a>\nAll images in the post are created by AI, those children do not exist in the real world.\nThe text dividers were made by me using [aseprite](https://www.aseprite.org/)\nPost translated from spanish to english using <a href=\"https://deepseek.com/\">Deepseek AI</a>\n</center>\n \n\n[//]: # (CCC LINKS PLACEHOLDER, DON'T DELETE THIS TAG)",

        "body": "Greetings, everyone!\n\nTo start with, I want to give God all the glory for a new week He has granted unto us. A week of favor, blessings, opportunities, and God's mercy. Thank you, Jesus, for the new week.\n\nAccording to this week's featured contest, the practical skills that have nothing to do with online skills or business are teaching, cosmetics, or clothing. These are the practical skills I have that I believe will give me enough money without an online business.\n\n![fragrance-1991531_1280.jpg](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/peckypeace/23xerGH845RBC544hLvBWXvSfF8ezMzhX9TJhzx3QtvB7otgkGq77fhQBmmpAQagpatNJ.jpg)\n\n[Source](https://pixabay.com/photos/fragrance-perfume-perfumery-1991531/ \"https://pixabay.com/photos/fragrance-perfume-perfumery-1991531/\")\n\nIn today's world, we need to have many streams of income that will sustain us, If the white collar doesn't pay, online will do, if both don't do, your practical skills will even do better than. So, having practical skills alongside your online business is pivotal to your finances, health, and many things.\n\nHow long have I had these practical skills\n==========================================\n\nWell, I have not engaged in any of these skills yet, but I have been engaging them in my mind to be actualized physically 😂 But if unfortunately, online business or skills are wiped away, I can enroll in this business even though I'm not a business-oriented person, but I will make money there. To be practically skilled with your hands or the value you offer that has created an impact on people's lives is good, and it can take you as long as it satisfies human needs. A few weeks ago, I just realized that I can braid hair. I did it with my roommate's hair while I was loosening her hairstyle. I was like what, so peace, you can do it. But I don't want to go into that skill publicly but I want to master it for my female children.\n\nHowever, before the online skills that is trending everyone, practical skills were feeding millions of people in the world and, it is still feeding people, by then few, persons knew about different online businesses like cryptocurrency, Bitcoin, Ethereum, Blockchain technology and, many more that is helping a lot of people today. But then, practical skills are important to humanity and making life comfortable. My dad built his house with the practical skills of his hands, he made a sofa, executive chairs, and beddings, different furniture for people, and made natural wine from the raffia tree. The raffia one gave him more money and he used that to put up a house construction for himself. It was so beautiful as I stood as a young girl at that time watching the foundation of the house.\n\nHaving practical skills is good even with the online business, but in case the online business fails, the hands-on work will still be on the ground, and it will go a long way for you and your family. Practical skills are good and I'm planning to settle the two I mentioned before at one location.\n\nI can testify to my brother's hard work that they are making a huge amount of money from their practical work, one is doing the POP business and one is into fashion, sewing men's dresses, and designing.\n\nOverall, let's keep up with our handwork and expand it; if possible, we can do it online too.\n\n**_This post is in response to the #Hivelearners featured contest week 173 episode 1_**\n\n**_I love, I care, and I forgive_**\n\n**_I remain @peckypeace_**",

        "body": "\n![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmWW2LYLuFGS8Nx7F8Ly4djSK8j8nhLYqCijKsTrY4tz8o/1751900038187.jpg)\n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">We live in a world where almost everything is digital. The majority of us are more engaged in doing things online than offline.\n\nWe build our lives, our relationships, our careers, skill and so on online and it is not our fault, with the way things are going it seems to be the only available option.\n\nThere are a lot of advantages attached to working online, although there are risks involved the income is usually superior to that of those who work offline with the exception of entrepreneurs.\n\nThe comfort and liberty attached to the job is another thing that drives people to it. Working online gives you time and peace, you can schedule your work for any time and you can also do it anywhere.\n\nHowever, as much as we know the opportunities online can never go extinct completely, it is possible for some of them to eventually come to an end and who knows what the future holds? Nothing is reliable and with the kind of government we have, anything can happen, we can wake up one day and the internet would no longer be there. \n\nThis is why it has been advised that people should always have something else to do offline aside from their work online.\n\nWhile I was in my second year in college, I started learning satellite dish installation. I spent a couple of time on the skill due to the fact that I was learning and still going to school at the same time.\n\nIt was a very nice skill and at the time I was learning, the skill was rare in my place. \n\nAround 2020, I had to leave it and travel out to look for a job and my primary aim was to gather money to buy a satellite finder. With the machine, it is very easy to catch signals.\n\nAt that time, I think it was around thirty thousand Naira. But when I traveled out, I couldn't stay long, due to the covid outbreak so I returned.\n\nThat was how I neglected the skill. Right now if the internet ceases and there is no opportunity online anymore, that is exactly where I am going back to. \n\nI  have had that skill for almost six years, but I have not been really serious with it. The truth is, I left it because I have other opportunities online. It was difficult to get customers back then, you have to be called first before you can render your service. \n\nSometimes during the dry season, you have to stay without work, and having no satellite finder was another thing. It was a difficult situation for me. \n\nBut seriously, seeing this prompt, I am moved to think again, what if online opportunities cease? What if the person or company you are working for decided to shut down, how would you cope?\n\n![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmb3SbyiGjB5AdXxRN3H6CEzuJx8Pe322CLsTXWSd8BUrB/1751900055745.jpg)\n\nIt's such a sensitive question. Recently I have had it in mind to resume the skill part-time. But I have been procrastinating and delaying because I want to first go back to my boss and improve my skills, it's been quite some time since I worked. Well, I hope to do just that soon enough. \n\n------\n\nN.B: All Images Were Generated By Meta AI\n\n------\n\n\n\n<center><h4>Thanks For Reading</h4></center>\n\n\n</div>\n",

        "body": "\n\n\n<Center>![010944975eb09997104246be4ed8ed54.jpg](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/uri07/23y8qepkPfcaDqrYi2g1Pv93XUbZvK5ZgCa5xTr3iXiVYN9Z3kUK6PqV3xh6FkN4AXTaw.jpg)</Center>\n<Center>[Fuente ](https://pin.it/5iUbBHKfs)</Center>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"text-justify\"><p>Hello to the entire community of beautiful women of Hive, I hope you are all doing very well and well this time I wanted to participate in the contest since the proposal is quite good, I really liked both questions, I was quite undecided which of the two to choose and well I decided on the second one. There are many female characters that I have researched a lot of their history over the years, many have captivated me, many are from science fiction, like anime, DC comics, others are from real history such as empresses, queens among others, but I think the one that characterizes me the most is \"Queen Elizabeth I\"\n\n\n>Hola a toda la comunidad de mujeres tan bellas de Hive, espero que todas estén muy bien y bueno en esta ocasión quise participar en el  concurso ya que la propuesta está bastante buena,me gustaron mucho las dos preguntas ,estaba bastante indecisa cuál de las dos es coger y bueno me decidí por la segunda. Existen muchos personajes femeninos que he investigado mucho de su historia a través de los años bastantes me han cautivado muchos son de ciencia ficción, como el anime ,DC cómic,  otros son de la historia real como lo son emperatrices, reinas entre otras ,pero creo que la que más me caracteriza es la \"Reina Isabel I\"\n\n\n\n<Center>![00f83459bd7d9c776c14b58e32a1a852.jpg](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/uri07/23wgCx3R9hnkVpxZoTb46qAeuXjNYAgYMrdyq28snyZQh1WyyAvFKY1c2zMFZH6GexiYH.jpg)</Center>\n<Center>[Fuente ](https://pin.it/59bNZyyX6)</Center>\n\n\n\nAlthough this character is in the books and existed in real life there are also movies and series about her, I was very struck by what I have seen in the movies where she is portrayed and in the books that exist about her and the truth is that she is a very inspiring character because being the monarch of an entire nation, having to face an army and do many of the things that she did in life is quite difficult and for the time she was the first woman to be monarch there in the United Kingdom so she had more weight, her family tree was also quite complex because she was the daughter of Henry VIII, she went through many vicissitudes, she got sick at a very early age, she never married and she did not have any offspring, they called her the virgin queen and she was quite feared, I think that she and the Queen Mother have been two of the most feared queens in Europe. Elizabeth for everything she did for the crown of the United Kingdom in my humble opinion in her time having thus raised an empire and the Queen Mother, who confronted Hitler in the Second World War therefore this is a character with quite a lot of character.\n>Aunque este personaje está en los libros y existió en la vida real también hay películas y series sobre ella me llamó mucho la atención lo que he visto en las películas donde la retratan y en los libros que existen sobre ella y la verdad es un personaje muy inspirador pues ser monarca de una nación completa tener que enfrentarte a un ejército y hacer muchas de las cosas que ella hizo en vida es algo bastante difícil y para la época fue la primera mujer en ser monarca allá en Reino Unido entonces más peso tenía, su árbol genealógico también era bastante complejo pues ella era hija de Enrique VIII, pasó por muchas vicisitudes ,se enfermó a muy temprana edad, nunca se casó y tampoco tuvo una descendencia ,la llamaban la reina virgen y era bastante temida creo que ella y la Reina Madre han sido dos de las reinas más temidas de Europa. Isabel por todo lo que hizo por la corona del Reino Unido a mi humilde opinión en su tiempo haber  levantando así un imperio y la Reina Madre, que se enfrentó a Hitler en la segunda Guerra mundial por lo tanto este es un personaje con bastante carácter.\n\n\n\n<Center>![5a8748dce18b3e2b10c2a1a7fe8c2ff2.jpg](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/uri07/23tS36mHDTWSHMnUTzPUBC87ygUcEyGSkXX5tnL47jpPCEPjDmCpe1Fd2iRdjthkLXuRv.jpg)</Center>\n<Center>[Fuente ](https://pin.it/4mRqGPZxq)</Center>\n\n\n\nIt also reflects how fragile we can be in the face of quite complex situations, how lonely the weight of a responsibility as great as the one she faced can feel. I identify a lot with her because, although I am not in charge of a country or an empire, hahaha, I have had people under me in my profession, I have had to face difficult situations as a leader and she has been one of the many women I know and I know their stories.  Elizabeth I, has been an example to me, and more than an example, a reminder. I think her greatest lesson was the courage and strength she had when taking charge of the entire empire, making all the reforms she did in her time. Let's remember that she was literally handed a country in ruins. Her father had made the country queens, plunging it into poverty. There were many conflicts, the Catholic Church, the Anglican Church, many things, and she had to unify, she had to start building from scratch. Many people didn't believe in her. Of all the lines of succession, she was like the last. She had to lead the country forward and leave her emotions and feelings behind. She couldn't marry; she was quite strong.  A part shows a fragility with respect to the stereotype that was had of beauty at that time, it was quite cruel, in fact the makeup they used at that time was lead so she got sick and had to use that makeup so people could not see her face, it was literally deformed by the lead itself and she died because of that, she died alone and with that great responsibility on her shoulders, for me Elizabeth I represents that resilience that not everyone can acquire and more than resilience, I think that leaders are brave people because you say \"I will do this, I will guide these people, I take command\". It is not an easy decision, it is not only about resolving disputes with other people, but also with the same people that you are leading and it is knowing how to deal with those situations and that what other people say about you, criticize you for being a leader does not affect you, knowing how to listen to others and the good opinions, the constructive criticism that they can give you, but also putting aside the destructive ones and that  path of loneliness that some leaders go through, that not everyone is your friend, not everyone is your confidant and you have to learn to become strong, because behind you there are people who depend on you, therefore Elizabeth I is in my top 10 of very important historical figures, graceful, I really liked this question, really if I could talk more often about this I would take out like 1000 posts of all the female characters that I know, not only from the history of the world or Venezuela, but from fantasy books and movies, but in general what is Elizabeth the First, Sultana Hurrem and other women who have made history, are the ones that I always take as an example, they are definitely women who for their time doing what they did was not easy, they achieved it and went down in world history, we are in the 21st century and still if you continue hearing about these women and others; I love it a lot even if it sounds somewhat feminist without the desire to offend anyone, I really like it when women make history in history, excuse the redundancy, when  They rise with courage and resilience, when they are the ones who command and lead, the ones who pave the way, it is a type of courage because they are flowers that seem fragile but have thorns and have courage, that is very admirable to see. Of course, we are not now in the centuries where they existed, where there were wars, there were other types of conflicts, however, in our century there are different types of conflicts and I know that there are still women who make history every day depending on their regions, where they are, in what they do, but I know that there are women who make history, each one of us makes history, becoming examples of struggle, resilience and courage.\n>También refleja los frágiles que podemos ser ante situaciones bastante complejas, de lo solitaria que se puede sentir el peso de una responsabilidad  tan grande como el que ella enfrentó, me identifico mucho con ella porque si bien,  no tengo a mi cargo un país ni un imperio jajaja si he tenido gente a mi cargo en mi profesión, si he tenido que enfrentarme a situaciones difíciles como líder y ella ha sido entre tantas mujeres que conozco y sé sus historias. Isabel I, ha sido para mí un ejemplo, y más que un ejemplo un recordatorio ,creo que  su mayor lección fue la valentía y la fuerza que tuvo al hacerse cargo de todo el imperio, hacer todas las reformas que hizo en su tiempo, recordemos que ella literalmente le entregaron un país hecho ruinas, su padre había hecho reinas  al país, sumergiendolo en la pobreza, había muchos conflictos, la iglesia católica, la anglicana, muchas cosas y ella tuvo que unificar, tuvo  que empezar a construir desde cero, mucha gente no creía en ella, de todas las líneas de sucesiones ella era como  la última, le tocó sacar un país adelante y dejar atrás sus emociones y  sentimientos, no se pudo casar, ella era bastante fuerte. A parte muestra   una fragilidad con respecto a el estereotipo que se tenía de belleza en aquel entonces,era bastante cruel, de hecho el maquillaje que utilizaban en esa época era plomo por lo tanto ella se enfermó y tenía que utilizar ese maquillaje para que la gente no le vieran el  rostro ,estaba literalmente deformado por el propio plomo y murió a causa de eso, murió sola y con esa gran responsabilidad en  sus hombros, para mí Isabel I, representa esa resiliencia que no todo el mundo puede adquirir y más que una resiliencia, creo que los líderes son personas valientes porque el tú decir \"Yo haré esto ,yo guiaré a estas personas, yo tomo el mando\" .No es una decisión fácil, no solamente es resolver   licisitudes con otras personas, sino también con la misma gente que tú estás guiando y es saber lidiar con esas situaciones y que lo que las demás personas digan de ti, te critiquen por ser líder no te afecte, saber escuchar a los demás y las opiniones buenas, las críticas constructivas que te puedan dar, pero también hacer a un lado las destructivas y ese camino de soledad que algunos líderes atraviesan, de que no todo el mundo es tu amigo ,no todas las personas  son tus confidentes y tienes que aprender a hacerte fuerte, porque detrás de ti hay personas que dependen de ti, por lo tanto Isabel I ,está en mi top 10 de personajes históricos muy importantes,  agraciados ,me gustó mucho esta pregunta de verdad si pudiera hablar más seguido de esto  sacaria como 1000 post de todos los personajes femeninos que conozco, no solamente de la historia del mundo o de Venezuela,sino de libros y películas de fantasía,   pero en general lo que es Isabel la primera, la sultana Hurrem y otras  mujeres que han hecho historias, son las que siempre llevo como un ejemplo,definitivamente son mujeres que para su época hacer lo que hicieron no fue nada fácil, lo lograron y pasaron a la historia del mundo estamos en pleno siglo 21 y todavía si sigue escuchando sobre estas mujeres y otras más;Me encanta mucho aunque suene algo feminista sin el afán de querer ofender a nadie me gusta mucho cuando las mujeres hacen historia en la historia valga la redundancia, cuando se alzan de valentía de resiliencia, cuando son ellas las que mandan y comandan, las que abren camino, es un  tipo de valentía porque son flores que parecen frágiles pero tienen espinas y tienen valor, eso es muy admirable de ver claro no estamos ahorita en los siglos donde ellas existieron donde habían guerras habían otro tipo de conflictos, sin embargo en nuestro siglo existen diferentes tipos de conflictos y  sé que siguen habiendo mujeres que día  hacen historia dependiendo de sus regiones, de donde estén, en que se desenvuelvan,pero sé que hay mujeres que hacen historia, cada una de nosotras hace historia, convertiendose  en ejemplos de lucha, resiliencia y valor.\n\n\n<Center>![65bd485c7f184278121a7ecca8cf5a59.jpg](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/uri07/23tbrtMRg7t8Lefqx3qu6BtvfySHacCBwZQK2T2j2AvDzAqeDEiXrq1n1vQpMvo2nLe87.jpg)</Center>\n\n<Center>[Fuente ](https://pin.it/7LiMviRNR)</Center>\n\n\nI truly, with all my heart, hope you liked my post. Thank you for getting here and well, I hope to see you again another time. See you next time! 🥰\n>De verdad de todo corazón espero que mi post les haya gustado Gracias por llegar hasta aquí y bueno espero volver a vernos en otra ocasión ¡hasta la próxima!🥰\n\n\n\n\n<Center>![Picsart_24-05-01_19-31-34-406.jpg](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/uri07/244KZwwJ22RuUwHbaYQTtQmqa2he8tbpQL5fLuVfz7sNNcmVx1SG9oCx1HeF8rHWm6MZi.jpg)</Center>\n\n\n</div>",

        "body": "<center>\n![MINITHEBRUTALREALITYOFVENEZUELAHEALTHCARESYSTEM.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23xozKH6L68CF1Xxw7nUMzBkXJX2KvuYiLRydM6DeeqoyESdKJcpH9miM4jVeNdT2iwBV.png)\n\n\n\n\n \n\n\n \n\n\n<sub>This is a publication based on the suggested topic proposed in the Hive Learners community through their discord, which on this occasion is <b>\"DOCTORS ON STRIKE\"</b>.\n</center>\n\n\n  \n\n---\n\n<center><h4>\"Health is a human right, not a privilege.\"\n<<  World Health Organization >>\n</h4></center>\n\n  \n \n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n  \n<sub></b></sub></div>\n  \n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n\n<hr>\n  \n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n</center>\n\n\nWelcome my new and regular readers to my blog. \n\nThe topic for today is doctors on strike, and the truth is that talking about this in a country like Venezuela is really something very painful because the crisis that we live in the Venezuelan health system truly represents one of the biggest health collapses in the world, and this has profound implications for nurses, doctors and of course for patients.  \n\nI am going to analyze in the best way with data, facts, information and show you currently what is happening with the Venezuelan health system and the situation. \n\nAs I see things, the current situation of the health sector in Venezuela in terms of what are the working conditions for medical personnel: starting with the part of the salaries, they make the salaries ridiculously unsustainable. \n\nA doctor here in Venezuela earns around two minimum salaries which is the equivalent of 5.7 dollars a month for the year 2024, and of course this is not enough to support a family basket which is around, if it is a family of three people well the family basket for a 3 person gropu should currently be around 1,200 dollars monthly and I think I am short, right?  \n\nSo the doctors, apart from the work they have in the government health institution, they also have to have several informal jobs. \n\nThis on the one hand. On the other hand the scarcity of medicines where there is an 88% shortage of essential medicines and a [79% of supplies such as needles, surgical material, alcohol, gauze sutures](https://www.redalyc.org/journal/3759/375956270002/html/), things as essential as this are missing in hospitals. \n\nSo the doctors have to go shopping or use equipment that is already old, obsolete – for example, shoe covers like surgical hats. So this is very serious.  \n\nOn the other hand, there is the part of the insecurity: there are robberies, shootings occur in emergencies because the gangs of criminals go to these places to justice the people who have been left alive in their mess. \n\nSo for example, to give you an example here in the university hospital of Caracas, doctors and nurses avoid going down the stairs because they are afraid of being robbed by the members of these gangs. So this is one of the very difficult realities of the health sector here in Venezuela.  \n\nThis is very serious. \n\nTalking about the employees, the doctors and the nurses – if we talk about the patients, there is a [31% increase in general mortality](https://www.bbc.com/mundo/noticias/2016/05/160426_venezuela_salud_doctores_dp) for 2015 because they do not have antibiotics, there are no physiological solutions, there are no mechanical ventilators or mechanical respirators for the sick. \n\nSo patients who have diabetes or serious infections die because they do not have how to have the treatment.  \n\nApart from this, diseases have reappeared that would no longer have to reappear like measles, diphtheria, malaria because there are many failures in prevention. There is a [49.8% of Venezuelans with serious health problems who have not received attention in 2024](https://alertavenezuela.org/blog/2025/02/11/2025-una-emergencia-que-no-cesa/), and we have an alarming figure of [only 7% of emergency services that are working](https://www.redalyc.org/journal/3759/375956270002/html/). So it is very serious.  \n\n79% of hospitals do not have current water services. 55% of hospitals have daily electrical failures. \n\nDialysis machines are paralyzed because there is no electricity in hospitals and patients die because they do not receive dialysis. \n\nPatients who are in intensive care die because the lung respirators have no way to be activated. [14% of intensive care units have been closed](https://www.redalyc.org/journal/3759/375956270002/html/) due to maintenance failures. \n\nSo the problems that there are on the part of patients are quite serious.  \n\nNow let's see the following: make a medical strike as a solution for all this. \n\nWell, on the one hand the protests at an international level they can pressure bodies like the UN to intervene. In 2024, post-electoral repression generated worldwide criticism. The protests of 2017 and 2019, which were very difficult years for Venezuela, called attention to the crisis. \n\nFor example, the so-called Bolivarian celebration of immunization 2025 appeared after many years of complaints because there was a shortage of vaccines. Then something was achieved. This would be in favor.  \n\nBut there are many risks and many limitations in a system that has half of the hospitals that are not working. Making a medical strike would paralyze services that are already bad and would increase the number of deaths that can be avoided. \n\nAnd the government here in Venezuela uses tactics called Tum Tum operatives which are based on massive detentions or criminalization by law against non-governmental organizations. For example, here in Venezuela in 2024 passports were canceled to critics and 1,900 opponents were detained including doctors, nurses and medical personnel who are against this.  \n\nAnd on the other hand, the government attributes the hospital crisis to economic wars or sanctions and rejects international aid. Then making a strike will obviously be labeled by the government as a sabotage.  \n\nI believe that the solution to all this is to ally with international organizations like the Red Cross to be able to get medicines to hospitals and patients and try to avoid that narrative of foreign intervention so that the government does not use this in its favor, and build community support networks so that the supplies are distributed clandestinely because it is the only way to get out of all this problem.  \n\nI believe that the strike – in truth a medical strike in Venezuela carries very serious and catastrophic risks in the short term – but if nothing is done the system will definitely collapse. \n\nSo I think the strike should be for a few days in terms of duration, partially stop the hospitals and support with these volunteer networks for emergencies and look for these international alliances to get out of this problem.  \n\nBut basically all this is summarized in the fact that the money that goes to the hospitals comes into the hands of the corrupt and supplies are stolen, supplies are lost and none of these things work. So it is also a problem at the level of corruption that must be improved.  \n\nAnd well, this is what I can tell you, is my opinion about this interesting issue of the medical strike here in Venezuela.  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n<hr>\n \n</div>\n\n\n \n\n\n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n<sub>This is my black cat \"manclar\", this  account is to honor his dead (it happened years ago).</sub> \n</center>\n \n<center>\n![firmanclaravatar50.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23xoaKGtUX7bFkH9miKiyCofJxFmB9eVPahe6bypqtgorcdrUH6LmvJQA51mg9G54D5ed.png)\n<hr>\nVisit the Neon Strike discord, the game of the future today!\n<a href=\"https://discord.gg/k8Db657uMW\">\n<img src=\"https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/midnight-studio/23wWprbiQYjoYfCn2ZT4225KZD19hhwxDaEt1FHyGNLwzriiaf8r9Mf5knk96FMGq5jBC.png\"><sub>(Discord)</sub></a>\n\n<center>\nCredits:\n\nThumbnail image maded using <a href=\"https://leonardo.ai\n\"> Leonardo AI</a> and edited with <a href=\"https://www.canva.com/design/DAFzU3jLsdI/mDAzQI5br7TWyqx_ww5WqA/edit?utm_content=DAFzU3jLsdI&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton\">Canva.com</a>\nAll images in the post are created by AI, those children do not exist in the real world.\nThe text dividers were made by me using [aseprite](https://www.aseprite.org/)\nPost translated from spanish to english using <a href=\"https://deepseek.com/\">Deepseek AI</a>\n</center>\n \n\n[//]: # (CCC LINKS PLACEHOLDER, DON'T DELETE THIS TAG)",
