        "body": "<center>\n![miniecoanxiety.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23tbyW1KCoN5dwhZRFQZYLcGgxc8CWXunqnjXqwoHbd8XDb1Hy7u8747Gb345rZ8WnKTL.png)\n\n\n\n \n\n\n\n\n\n<sub>This is a publication based on the suggested topic proposed in the Hive Learners community through their discord, which on this occasion is <b>\"CLIMATE CHANGE\"</b>.\n</center>\n\n\n  \n\n---\n\n<center><h4>\"We are the first generation to feel the effect of climate change and the last generation who can do something about it.\"\n<<  Barack Obama >>\n</h4></center>\n\n  \n \n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n  \n<sub></b></sub></div>\n  \n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n\n<hr>\n  \n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n</center>\n\n\nHello friends, welcome to my blog and today I will be talking about climate change. The truth is that this is a topic that is quite delicate. \n\nIn my experience with climate change has been quite unpleasant since I live in a tropical country like Venezuela. \n\nHere we have all the seasons we can afford to have all the seasons, and when we suffer this type of climate change it affects us.  \n\nFor example, in my case I live in an area that is known for being very cold in the state of Miranda. The temperatures are usually pleasant and very low, and with this climate change produced by the pollution of the environment, the people that throw away a lot of waste, and this produces toxic gas emissions and changes the environment and makes the temperatures rise. \n\nSo I have had not being able to sleep well at night due to the high temperature and what I am used to living in a climate that is pleasant, that is cold, where I can dress up and sleep comfortably in my bed.  \n\nWhen there are these hot nights, I start to sweat and as I am a person of great proportions, this causes me a lot of annoyance because it stains my sweat sheet and I stay all night sweating and worried. It is very uncomfortable. \n\nAdded to this, because we have the problem that at least in my case where I live, we have problems with the supply of water and the water because it is not supplied due to issues of rationing and issues. \n\nThis not only of rationing at the country level but of the building that has problems with the facilities and the machine that pumps the water.  \n\nThen we have a problem with that and there is a liquid rationing in addition to the rationing that we have due to the water crisis that exists in the country. We also have a rationing apart, making it more difficult for us to have water and we have the service only twice a week. \n\nThen when there are these nights that are very hot, it is really very difficult to overcome it because you have to have large amounts of water stored in the house and due to the rationing we only have one hour for twice a week to be able to store all the water we can.  \n\nDuring that time, because it is not enough for us to store large amounts of water but only the basics to be able to, let's say, meet the needs of doing the bathroom towards the house and being able to bathe one and something that remains to be able to make the food, wash the food in the kitchen and cook. \n\nBut they do not remain for other cases as for these cases that I am naming in which it is very hot at night and one has to bathe. It is really difficult.  \n\nIn my case, this has produced something that is known as eco-anxiety, which is anxiety due to these climate changes and it has affected me mentally because every time there are seasons in which it is too hot, I worry a lot. \n\nBecause as I have said, for being a person of great volume, I sweat more, my sweating is more intense and this brings a serious problem because all my clothes need to be washed and I need a greater amount of water to do it, and both the bedding and the clothes that I wear daily.  \n\nAnd this due to climate change because it is a great inconvenience not having enough water to be able to do things as basic as this. Climate change in general has a very strong impact in the world. \n\nIn addition to these waves of intense heat, the changing seasons to places where the summer was soft, now with this climate change it becomes very intense and dangerous. Winters are shorter in many areas and the ecosystems and traditional activities and the life of the people in those places occur in very extreme events such as floods, droughts, fires.  \n\nThat is, those mega droughts that have occurred in countries such as the west of the United States that entire forests are burned due to drought, ecosystems are altered with massive whitening of the corals in the sea, glaciers melt as in the Andes or in the Alps. \n\nThere is a lot of bird migration and change, migration changes and the plants desynchronize and all the food chains change. So there are also many species that invade places where they did not live because the ecosystem changes.  \n\nThere is a lot of loss in agriculture due to floods or droughts, the roads crack a lot due to the heat, diseases also increase and many people die from the heat. Then there are many things. \n\nThere is also migratory displacement that millions of people move from one place to another every year precisely because of these climatic disasters due to the rise of the sea due to the great droughts and the site becomes uninhabitable. Then people have to move to another place.  \n\nI do not think we have to take a lot of awareness in terms of climate change today and I think we are still in time to create awareness and educate people to take care of the planet and that it does not pollute. \n\nEspecially we are still in time to recover the planet, but we have to take an urgent action. \n\nNot yet the situation is not irreversible, but we must reduce carbon emissions.         "body": "<center>\n![MINIDESGASTESLENTESROTOS.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23wMWRvXU7NDx3GSAMvKexUQF3aUfutBaJyPkevohaxEf2erppNNn3hsfV2gNdR8AKhNP.png)\n</center>\n\n---\n \n \n\n<sub>Esta es una publicación basada en el tema de la semana propuesto por @talentos, conducido por @angelica7 y que en esta ocasión es  <a href=\"https://peakd.com/c/hive-147177/created\">\"El rumbo\"</a> .</sub></div>\n<hr>\n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n<center><h4>\"Cuando el cuerpo grita y la mente suplica, es hora de redirigir el rumbo.\" \n<< Anónimo >></h4></center>\n<hr>\n<div class=\"text-justify\"> \n\n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n</center>\n\n\nBienvenidos una vez más a mis asiduos lectores a mi blog y también los nuevos. \n\nEl tema que me ocupa en esta ocasión es el rumbo. \n\nEs un tema sumamente personal porque ponerme a conversar acerca de cuál es el rumbo que lleva mi vida es algo que no me agrada compartir aquí en este espacio. \n\nTal vez si tuviera un blog personal como el que llevo en blogspot, si lo comentaría por allá porque es otro tipo de audiencia. Pero para la audiencia que tengo actualmente acá en Hive, me parece completamente incorrecto el tratar este tipo de temas. \n\nSin embargo, voy como siempre a hablarles por encima de una manera muy escueta a lo que pienso y las ideas que tengo al respecto sobre lo que es el rumbo en la vida.\n\nMi vida ya saben que ha sido bastante desafiante y retadora, llena de conflictos y de situaciones bastante extremas y complicadas. Desde venir de una familia disfuncional hasta tener desafíos financieros bastante complicados, con una cantidad de necesidades y de cosas que reparar en casa y no teniendo la capacidad financiera para reparar o suplir estas necesidades, pues desmejora notablemente la calidad de vida. \n\nEsto ha sido un factor constante que ha afectado el rumbo y el destino que llevan las cosas. \n\nPor ejemplo, actualmente es necesario para mí, dentro de mis prioridades, cambiar el rumbo para poder satisfacer estas necesidades, como lo son el adquirir un par de lentes de visión nueva porque estos ya están vencidos y me cuesta mucho realizar las publicaciones, escribir los textos y hacer mi pixel art debido a que veo todo borroso. \n\nEsto es porque mis lentes ya, la fórmula esta vencida y necesito actualizar la fórmula. Llevo teniendo este problema aproximadamente dos años, o sea que tengo los lentes vencidos hace dos años y no he podido reponerlo debido a que, pues reponerlo cuesta 80 o 100 dólares o más actualmente. \n\nEste dinero está destinado a pagar mi sustento en alimentos y los servicios básicos como el internet y el teléfono. Gastar ese dinero o invertirlo en los lentes significa que pongo en riesgo cualquiera de los otros servicios que son muy necesarios para mí.\n\nPero el rumbo que estoy tomando y que he decidido tomar ha sido el, dentro de lo posible, distanciarme de lo que son las publicaciones acá en la blockchain porque resulta muy agotador para mí el ritmo que estoy llevando. \n\nEl rumbo que vengo llevando desde hace ocho años acá en la blockchain y, para ser más preciso, desde hace unos tres años publicando cuatro publicaciones semanales, es un ritmo bastante duro como creador de contenido. \n\nLlevar dos o tres años haciendo cuatro publicaciones a la semana es bastante agotador (no opines sobre esto si no lo has hecho nunca). \n\n\nLe comentaba yo a un amigo recientemente que necesito tener un descanso por lo menos de unos dos meses de hive sin tener que publicar. \n\nLamentablemente, no me puedo dar en estos momentos el lujo de cambiar ese rumbo o de toma ese rumbo y coger un descanso, porque necesito los ingresos que me están proporcionando. \n\nPor otro lado, la valoración de las recompensas que son actualmente alrededor de cinco hive por publicación representan un dólar diario. \n\nEl estar generando eso en total hace alrededor de siete dólares semanales que es lo que recibo actualmente en recompensas en hive. Pues es algo que es muy importante para mí porque mantiene el rumbo de supervivencia que estoy llevando actualmente.\n\n¿Cómo me he planteado yo cambiar este rumbo? Bueno, mis ideas actualmente, lo que estoy llevando a cabo es distanciarme de lo más posible que pueda de los contenidos en hive porque me estoy desgastando demasiado. \n\nMe siento muy desgastado y esto pues obviamente requiere de que cambie de rumbo. \n\nNo lo puedo dejar actualmente porque necesito tener este sustento hasta que yo logre verdad cambiar totalmente el rumbo y no depender de los ingresos de hive, sino tenerlo únicamente como un ingreso extra. \n\nActualmente tengo otra actividad a la que me dedico también a parte este que me está generando un buen ingreso. \n\nPero aparte de eso, hasta no tener una base sólida que digamos que tenga unos ocho meses trabajando en eso que me permita dejar definitivamente a hive o alejarme pues bastante de aqui y no tenga otra cosa que es a la que me estoy dedicando actualmente, debo seguir sufriendo y haciendo lo que hago, es mi realidad, tengo que joderme. \n\nMi otro ingreso de lo que estoy haciendo, es algo que es establecido y muy firme, algo que viene haciendose por miles de personas desde el año 1997, y que no estoy dispuesto a compartirle a ustedes porque es algo privado. Tampoco quiero que ninguna persona de acá de hive, o que yo me entere que sea de hive, que la que la conozca y este alla,  invada ese espacio que busco tener, porque es algo muy personal. Es algo que quiero que quiero tener muy muy para mí y yo sé que probablemente hay personas de hive en ese lugar, pero no quiero enterarme de quienes son, sino simplemente quiero separar lo que es el contenido de acá de hive con lo que yo estoy haciendo en el otro lugar, para poder tener mi paz y mi tranquilidad mental.\n\nMi rumbo va enfocado hacia ese aspecto y hacia ese lado totalmente para tener una vida mejor, para poder comprarme los lentes, poder reparar la cantidad de gastos que tengo acá y eso va a poderme permitir a mí tener una mente más relajada, más desestresado y más productivo. \n\nPues poder disfrutar de ese descanso a mi mente que tanto necesita de llevar produciendo tres años seguidos contenido durante cuatro veces a la semana, es algo que me tiene agotado físicamente y me está causando daños a nivel físico y a nivel mental por el nivel de ansiedad y estrés que me genera el tener que estar presionado por asuntos de supervivencia. \n\nPorque si no lo hago, si no generó estos contenidos, no puedo tener el ingreso que necesito. \n\nY ya sé que ustedes dirán que puedo dedicarme a otras cosas, pero estoy precisamente tomando otras cosas adicionales para que una vez que logre la estabilidad con esas otras cosas, pueda ir dejando paulatinamente el ritmo que estoy llevando acá en hive y dedicarme a otras cosas para poder así estar más tranquilo.\n\nEsto es lo que puedo decirles en cuanto al rumbo que llevo en mi vida y espero que pues ustedes logren tener y analizar el rumbo que tienen en sus vidas porque es algo muy importante. \n\nEntiendo muy bien si no deseen compartirlo porque es algo que es muy personal. Yo lo veo como algo muy muy personal la verdad y es algo que parte de cada quien. \n\nPor supuesto, estos planes que son tan personales, yo considero que no se deben compartir sino solamente con las personas más queridas y las personas más cercanas. Porque precisamente cuando se hablan de este tipo de cosas o este tipo de proyectos, hay mucha envidia de por medio y hay muchas personas que pueden producir mala vibra.\n\n Yo trato de alejarme de ese tipo de personas y de ese tipo de escenario. \n \n Además, que considero que hive es únicamente un sitio que me genera recompensas para mí, que es muy interesante, que hay gente muy singular como no, pero que no quiero involucrarme con toda la gente del sitio, sino ser muy selectivo como lo decía a un amigo,  hasta el momento para saber a quién compartirle lo que es realmente mi rumbo y lo que estoy haciendo, mis proyectos y todo eso. \n \n Así que comprendo si tú también no quieres compartirlo. \n \nGracias por visitarme y espero que te haya gustado este pedacito que escuetamente compartía acerca de lo que es el rumbo de las cosas que estoy llevando.\n\n\n\n\n</div>\n\n\n\n\n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n</div>\n\n<center>\n\n\n\n\n<hr>\n\n</div>\n\n\n\n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVEgrande.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23uQrctdq5iWhp19Z8VE3hGiRitrzncjxKkMzwRRbBc9oJ6ho3VbKb3WFa3HxcNXKrRj5.png)\n</center>\n\n<center>\n\n<sub>This         "body": "<center>\n![minipromesas.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23w2sCDq7xVB28yR3vGjKo3ccGzyEwWL1syayxAYteBBA2hbGq1UAS78bQ158yNQF9VWa.png)\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<sub>This is a publication based on the suggested topic proposed in the Hive Learners community through their discord, which on this occasion is <b>\"A BROKEN PROMISE\"</b>.\n</center>\n\n\n  \n\n---\n\n<center><h4>\"We must not promise what we ought not, lest we be called on to perform what we cannot.\"\n<<  Abraham Lincoln >>\n</h4></center>\n\n  \n \n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n  \n<sub></b></sub></div>\n  \n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n\n\n<hr>\n  \n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n</center>\n\nGreetings once again to my regular and new readers of this blog. Today's topic is a broken promise. \n\nThe truth is that in the world, as human beings, we will encounter people who break their promises.  \n\nI say it's a part of human nature. It can often be due to a person's lack of maturity, who hasn't been educated in ethical principles, and breaks the promise. Or in other cases, the person simply believes they'll be able to keep or fulfill that promise.  \n\nAnd it turns out that he doesn't have the strength or the ability to fulfill that commitment, to keep his promises. I have broken promises I've made to someone. It's happened to me on occasion, in fact, several times, so many times that I've forgotten them.  \n\nI remember when I was very young—well, I was a kid—my mom would tell me not to eat or take certain foods out of the fridge. And I promised my mom I wouldn't do it. The temptation was stronger than anything else, and I would end up breaking my promise.  \n\nBecause I would go straight to the fridge when she wasn't looking and grab that piece of cake or that candy I'd promised not to eat and enjoy it. \n\nI remember that I broke those promises about not eating the candy she made simply because the temptation and desire to try that delicious candy waiting for me in the fridge was greater than my willpower to keep that promise. \n\nI was a child, I admit it, and for me that was justified because I really wanted to eat that candy.  \n\nOf course, as a child, I was seeing it from that immature perspective and not as something that could really affect my mom. Because my mom really felt bad when I ate that sweet treat she had prepared for sale. \n\nIt was a pancake she had made to sell to the neighbor, whom the neighbor had asked for it, and it was an order for a purchase she had already committed to.  \n\nI didn't know she had promised to make that candy for the neighbor. She had simply told me not to eat it from the fridge. I promised her I wouldn't, and I didn't know it was for the neighbor, and I ended up eating it. \n\nAnd I got my mom into trouble because the neighbor had ordered that candy from her and paid her in advance.  \n\nAnd my mom was waiting for him until she came to pick him up, which she would pick up in a few hours after she got to work. And of course, this put my mom in a difficult position because she had to apologize to the neighbor and tell her she was going to do it the next day. And this was very uncomfortable for her.  \n\nI've broken promises, and I've had promises broken to me. In my case, I've lent money to someone, and that person has promised to pay me back on a certain date, in two weeks, for example. I've lent someone $50 worth of money.  \n\nAnd that person, after a while, two weeks went by, and the person didn't really call me, didn't pay me, didn't say anything. In fact, they were trying to hide, to avoid paying me that money. And what bothered me wasn't so much that they didn't pay me, but that they didn't contact me and said, \"Damn, look, I have this problem, or I won't be able to pay you yet, I'll pay you a week later or later.\"  \n\nWell, until I finally contacted that person and asked him why he hadn't paid me, what was going on. And he told me that he had actually had to make some emergency repairs to his house because he had a water leak in the showers and bathroom faucets. And that he spent the money he had to pay me on the repairs. So, he broke his promise in this case because of an emergency, a need he had, and then he delayed paying me, but he managed to pay me.  \n\nBut I think that was a valid reason to break the promise. Ultimately, we're human beings, and human beings will always believe they have the ability to fulfill something, and it's very likely they might not keep that promise, that they might be unfaithful to what they promised. I think the best way to avoid breaking a promise is to not make it.  \n\nThanks for visiting me.\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<hr>\n \n</div>\n\n\n \n\n\n<center>\n![DIVISORFIRMAHIVE502.png](https://images.hive.blog/400x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/EoK6FGqRG6WzTXMhKGECMXFKZ4spFiL4NHvne8X43JEJkHv4rKGfeu4Xgsp8BowXbad.png)\n<sub>This is my black cat \"manclar\", this  account is to honor his dead (it happened years ago).</sub> \n</center>\n \n<center>\n![firmanclaravatar50.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23xoaKGtUX7bFkH9miKiyCofJxFmB9eVPahe6bypqtgorcdrUH6LmvJQA51mg9G54D5ed.png)\n<hr>\nVisit the Neon Strike discord, the game of the future today!\n<a href=\"https://discord.gg/k8Db657uMW\">\n<img src=\"https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/midnight-studio/23wWprbiQYjoYfCn2ZT4225KZD19hhwxDaEt1FHyGNLwzriiaf8r9Mf5knk96FMGq5jBC.png\"><sub>(Discord)</sub></a>\n\n<center>\nCredits:\n\nThumbnail image maded using <a href=\"https://sl.bing.net/jjforiaxnvU\n\"> Bing AI</a> and edited with <a href=\"https://www.canva.com/design/DAFzU3jLsdI/mDAzQI5br7TWyqx_ww5WqA/edit?utm_content=DAFzU3jLsdI&utm_campaign=designshare&utm_medium=link2&utm_source=sharebutton\">Canva.com</a>\nAll images in the post are created by AI.\nThe text dividers were made by me using [aseprite](https://www.aseprite.org/)\nPost translated from spanish to english using <a href=\"https://deepseek.com/\">Deepseek AI</a>\n</center>\n \n\n[//]: # (CCC LINKS PLACEHOLDER, DON'T DELETE THIS TAG)",

    "body": "<center>\n![MINITHEHIDENCOSTOFFORGIVEN.png](https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23u64kLNkfqJV61qcFXGiSBeKjUWSdcAsoUxSiFGi7o9jRKUjMvxyRDhWEz5koVgJEdjm.png)\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<div class=\"text-justify\">\n\n#\n\n<center><img src=\"https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23tv8niTgDV9Nw5p2hSfnLTmaDqahUiDosHNzKbH4s77bUKPEFiUG1UZtmL4FmapuSSh8.jpg\"></center>\n<center><sub>*This is a bilingual publication, you can go directly to the SPANISH version by clicking [HERE](#Español\")*\n</sub><hr>This is my post for #freewriters 2810 prompt \"presidential pardon\" hosted by @mariannewest </center>\n<hr>\n\n\n\n\n\n\nSpeaking of a presidential pardon makes me imagine, at the very least, an uncomfortable situation. I put myself in the shoes of whoever has to make that decision.\n\n First of all, whoever is requesting it must have made a very serious mistake for a person to ask for a presidential pardon.  \n\nThe crime committed must have been treason against the country, stealing an impressive amount of money, and I also imagine it could involve someone who has likely embezzled large sums.\n\n Perhaps someone who revealed state secrets—this makes me think of many possibilities, including the fact that this person is an expert liar and probably a spy. \n\nThis individual may have worked for a long time in a consulate or been involved in government affairs, likely in an embassy, and knew many of the secrets discussed in that embassy or consulate.  \n\nFrom what I understand, based on my limited knowledge of the subject, consulates are responsible for facilitating trade alliances and operations between two countries. \n\nThe country that has a consulate in another nation—for example, Venezuela having a consulate in the United States—employs a consul (in this case, a Venezuelan) who is responsible for establishing trade relations between merchants, entrepreneurs, or industrialists from both countries.  \n\nThis is how alliances are formed, and I suppose that the person requesting this presidential pardon likely exploited some of the secrets they knew about these companies. \n\nI imagine they may have revealed information about secret contracts, undisclosed bids, and deals made to favor certain U.S. businessmen. And, as always, politics gets in the way.  \n\nSo, I believe the president and their advisors must carefully study who they grant a presidential pardon to. Obviously, there are many political influences at play here, because these kinds of pardons require the intervention of numerous mediators to make them happen. \n\nIn the case of the United States, I understand that governors can request a presidential pardon for someone.  \n\nThe president themselves can also decide to grant a presidential pardon. In Venezuela’s case, I recall this only happening with Hugo Chávez Frías, when former President Rafael Caldera granted him a presidential pardon or clemency for the crimes he committed in attempting to overthrow a government. He was given clemency, a presidential pardon, for that crime.  \n\nMany people comment that it was precisely because of this presidential pardon that the disaster leading to Venezuela’s current crisis unfolded. \n\nThe country is in turmoil because when this figure—and I say \"figure\" because he is not an important one in a positive sense, but rather an infamous one who led to the country’s destruction—was released from Venezuelan history. \n\nHad this person not been freed, they would have remained imprisoned or perhaps died in a dungeon, and the country might have taken a different, healthier path than the one we are living through now. \n\nPresidential pardons are a very delicate matter and must be handled with extreme caution.  \n\nSadly, political factors always interfere and influence who gets pardoned. I doubt that most of the pardons granted in different countries are legitimate or truly deserved. It is very difficult, really, to prove that someone deserves a presidential pardon.  \n\nThe person must have made amends in a very loyal and recognizable way to society for the harm they caused to deserve such a pardon. At least, that is what I think from my corner and my point of view.\n  \n\n\n\n\n\n<center>Translated with [Deepsek AI](https://deepseek.com) \n</p></center>\n\n# <center><div class=\"phishy\">Español<a id=\"Español\"></a></div></center>\n\n\nHablar de un indulto presidencial me hace imaginar una situación cuando menos incómoda. Me pongo en los zapatos de quien tiene que tomar esa decisión. \n\nPrimero que nada, quien lo esté solicitando debe haber cometido un error muy grave para que una persona solicite un indulto presidencial.  \n\nEl delito que debe haber cometido debe haber sido una traición a la patria, robar una cantidad impresionante de dinero, y también me imagino que se puede definir como alguien que probablemente ha robado mucho dinero. \n\nQuizás alguien que reveló secretos de estado y esto me hace pensar en muchas posibilidades, incluyendo el hecho de que esta persona es una especialista en mentir y probablemente esta persona es un espía. \n\nEsta persona ha trabajado por mucho tiempo para un consulado o involucrada en asuntos de gobierno, probablemente en una embajada y conocía muchos de los secretos de quienes hablaban en esa embajada o en ese consulado.  \n\nSegún he entendido, dentro del poco conocimiento que tengo del tema, que en los consulados se encargan de llevar a cabo alianzas y operaciones comerciales entre los dos países. \n\nEl país que es el representante, digamos, que tiene el consulado en otro país y el otro consulado, digamos que Venezuela tiene un consulado en Estados Unidos. \n\nEsta persona, este cónsul de Venezuela, que es venezolano, se encarga de establecer relaciones comerciales entre todos los comerciantes y todos los empresarios o industriales venezolanos y los industriales americanos.  \n\nDe esta manera, se crean alianzas y supongo que esta persona que está solicitando este indulto presidencial probablemente usó varios de los secretos que conocía sobre estas empresas. \n\nMe imagino que pudo haber revelado información sobre contratos secretos, de licitaciones secretas y tratos que se hicieron para favorecer a ciertos empresarios de Estados Unidos. \n\nY como siempre, la política está de por medio.  \n\nAsí que, creo que el presidente y las personas que lo rodean, que son los que lo hacen, tienen que estudiar muy bien a quién le van a dar este indulto presidencial. \n\nObviamente, aquí hay muchas influencias políticas de por medio, porque este tipo de indultos necesitan la intervención de muchas personas que median para que esto se pueda lograr. \n\nEntre ellos, hablando en el caso de Estados Unidos, entiendo que los gobernadores son los que pueden solicitar que a una persona se le dé un indulto presidencial.  \n\nY el mismo presidente puede decidir dar un indulto presidencial a esa persona. En el caso de Venezuela, creo que esto ocurrió que recuerdo solo con Hugo Chávez Frías, que el presidente, el expresidente Rafael Caldera, le dio un indulto presidencial o una indulgencia por los delitos que cometió de haber hecho o intentado el derrocamiento de un gobierno. Y se le dio una indulgencia, un indulto presidencial por haber cometido ese delito.  \n\nY mucha gente comenta y dice que precisamente como consecuencia de este indulto presidencial fue que todo el desastre que llevó a lo que es Venezuela hoy, el país está en crisis precisamente porque cuando este personaje fue liberado de la historia venezolana, y digo personaje porque no es precisamente un personaje importante de buena manera, sino que es un infame que llevó a la destrucción de lo que es el país hoy. \n\nSi esta persona no hubiese sido liberada, entonces esta persona seguiría atrapada en una mazmorra o probablemente habría muerto, pero en una mazmorra y el país quizás habría tenido otro destino, un destino más sano que el que tiene actualmente, que el que vivimos en estos momentos. Los indultos presidenciales son algo muy delicado y que se debe manejar con mucho cuidado.  \n\nLamentablemente, el factor político siempre está de por medio e influye en quienes van a ser indultados. Dudo que todos los indultos que se han otorgado en los diferentes países la mayoría sean legítimos o sean meritorios. \n\nEs muy difícil, realmente, demostrar que alguien merece un indulto presidencial.  \n\nLa persona tiene que haber reparado de una manera muy leal y reconocible con la sociedad el daño que ha hecho para poder merecer el indulto. Al menos esto es lo que pienso desde mi rincón y mi punto de vista.\n\n\n\n</div>\n\n<center>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nThumbnail of the post edit using [canva.com ](https://www.canva.com/)and maded with [Bing ai](https://sl.bing.net/gEmYP3nXbIy)\n\n\n![sepmanclarciudad.jpg](https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://files.peakd.com/file/peakd-hive/manclar/23u5SwkDMqTct4Kgqsv3RVeNxduJ3R3FDChujBLRHKcxWWPmnvnMa18nuuKjHxhFkJSK3.gif)\n<sub>This is my black cat \"manclar\", this hive name account is to honor his dead (it happened years ago).</sub>\n\n![](https://images.hive.blog/0x0/https://cdn.rcimg.net/MicroReylatos/eea03629/39af3c9a0e98248e06b4b9e61ceb136d.png)\n\n\nThe divisor is made by @albiro2050, if you want one made in your style, visit him and he will gladly take care of your commission.\n</center>\n\n---\n\n\n\nPosted Using [INLEO](https://inleo.io/@manclar/the-hidden-cost-of-forgiving-the-unforgivable-engspa-adj)",
